title: The Kumiho (SCP-953)
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:aesthetic-theme]]

ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ[[size larger]]→ Press The Collapsible To See ←[[/size]]


[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module CSS]]
#u-start, .textchange div.sitemember:nth-child(2) {display:none;}.type-wrap-wrapper {position: relative;text-align: left;}.type-wrapper {background: #555;}.typearea {color: lime; font-family: "Courier";font-size: 1.2em;margin: 10px 0 0 10px;white-space: nowrap;overflow: hidden;width: 0;}#u-start:target ~ .typearea {width: 100%;animation: type 4s steps(60, end); }.typearea a{color: lime;text-decoration: none;}.blink {animation: blink 1s infinite;}@keyframes type{ from { width: 0; } } @keyframes blink{to{opacity: .0;}}.buttonwrapper {text-align: center;}.likebutton {padding: 0.1em 0.5em;text-decoration: none;font-size: 1.3em;background-color: #770088;border: 1px solid #AAA;color: #000;}.likebutton:hover {background-color: #DDD;color: #000;border: 1px solid #4c137e;}
[[/module]] 
[[div class="type-wrap-wrapper"]]
[[div class="type-wrapper"]]
[[div id="u-start"]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="typearea"]]
[[div class="textchange"]]
[[module ListUsers users="."]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
Your wikidot ID is "%%name%%".[[span class="blink"]]|[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]
[[div class="sitemember"]]
I can't verify your wikidot ID.[[span class="blink"]]|[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="buttonwrapper"]]
[[a class="likebutton" href="#u-start"]]Click![[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP953" hide="- See"]]
[[image fox.png]]
> Hope you all like this. I'm still testing some lighting and shit along with the rendering. I had troubles in drawing the Hanbok since I made sure I drew it accurately by using a ton of references. I also had troubles with the color of her tail and the length of her hair.  To be fair I am actually proud of this, there is another version of this in the other collapsible with different lighting.  
>
>ㅤㅤㅤㅤ
>  [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-953 Scp 953] Article
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ SCP953ver2" hide="- This"]]
[[image f.png]]
> So I couldn't pick which lighting I should do so I decided to seperate the two drawings. Also 953 gang gang. Timelapse would be available if you like or you are patient enough in watching those in youtube. Also 3d figures saved my life. 
>
> Full Images will also be in twitter I mean- [https://twitter.com/ShionMachi X]
[[/collapsible]]

ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ[[size larger]]→ more in my [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:the-florescent-exhibit art page] ←[[/size]]
author: MasonFlores
